welcome.title: Welcome to SafetyHelp
welcome.description: Your trusted platform for occupational health and safety (OHS) in South Africa. We provide automated, AI-enhanced tools to ensure safety and compliance for workplaces, schools, churches, and informal sectors. Join our community to access resources, services, and support tailored to your needs.

why_choose.title: Why Choose SafetyHelp for OHS Compliance?
why_choose.content: SafetyHelp is your trusted partner for occupational health and safety compliance in South Africa. Our platform offers a comprehensive suite of tools tailored to meet the unique needs of industries like construction, mining, and manufacturing. From generating legal registers to conducting risk assessments, SafetyHelp simplifies complex OHS requirements with user-friendly wizards and real-time support through our AI-powered chatbot. Backed by South African regulations and best practices, we empower businesses to create safer workplaces while ensuring compliance with the OHSA and COIDA. Join thousands of professionals who rely on SafetyHelp to protect their teams and streamline safety processes.

client.title: Client Obligations
client.reg_5_1_a: Construction Regulation 5(1)(a): Prepare a Baseline Risk Assessment (BRA) identifying project hazards.
client.reg_5_1_b: Construction Regulation 5(1)(b): Provide a Health and Safety Specification outlining specific project requirements.
client.reg_5_1_l: Construction Regulation 5(1)(l): Accept the Contractor’s Health and Safety Plan before work begins.

contractor.title: Contractor Obligations
contractor.reg_7_1_a: Construction Regulation 7(1)(a): Submit a Health and Safety Plan based on the client’s specification.
contractor.reg_7_1_b: Construction Regulation 7(1)(b): Maintain a Health and Safety File on site with all required documentation.
contractor.reg_9: Construction Regulation 9: Conduct Risk Assessments and Hazard Identification Risk Assessments (HIRAs) specific to the work.

professional.title: H&S Professional Obligations
professional.reg_5_5: Construction Regulation 5(5): Agents (PrCHSA) manage H&S on behalf of the client, ensuring compliance.
professional.reg_8_5: Construction Regulation 8(5): Officers (CHSO) assist contractors in implementing and auditing H&S systems.
professional.sacpcmp: SACPCMP Guidelines: Must maintain registration and CPD requirements for professional status.

responses.hs_spec: A Health and Safety Specification outlines the client’s OHS requirements for a construction project, as per Construction Regulation 5(1)(b). It includes project details, hazards, and compliance obligations.
responses.hs_plan: A Health and Safety Plan is prepared by the contractor to address the client’s H&S Specification, detailing safety measures and procedures, as required by Construction Regulation 7(1)(a).
responses.risk_assessment: A Risk Assessment identifies hazards and evaluates risks for project activities, mandatory under Construction Regulation 9.
responses.sacpcmp: SACPCMP (South African Council for the Project and Construction Management Professions) accredits professionals like CHSOs and PrCHSAs to ensure OHS compliance.
responses.coida: COIDA (Compensation for Occupational Injuries and Diseases Act) requires employers to register for compensation coverage for workplace injuries.
